title: [娱乐]BlockMobs——方块生物 [1.12/1.15]
author: 祝睿先生
txt_content:
[BlockMobs]
通过方块和头颅生成怪物！


插件简述：
像搭建雪傀儡和铁傀儡的方式生成怪物


插件没啥好汉化的，我在配置文件里加了注释





MiFlashvcom.ini.jpg (338.39 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-3-3 11:45 上传







目前支持：
1xTNT+苦力怕头=苦力怕1x骨块+小白头=小白2x煤块+凋零骷髅=凋零骷髅1x骨块+僵尸头颅=尸壳1x 绿宝石+玩家头颅=村民
2x末影龙蛋+龙头=末影龙
默认允许玩家生成末影龙

没啥用的命令介绍
/Blockmobs help 查看帮助条例/Blockmobs reload 重新加载插件


插件配置及权限
blockmobs.* - Access to all commands & actions
blockmobs.user.* - Access to all user commands & actions
blockmobs.user.help - Access to /blockmobs help
blockmobs.user.build.* - Access to build all mobs
blockmobs.user.build.creeper - Access to build Creepers
blockmobs.user.build.skeleton - Access to build Skeletons
blockmobs.user.build.witherskeleton- Access to build Wither Skeletons
blockmobs.user.build.husk - Access to build Husks
blockmobs.user.build.villager - Access to build Villagers
blockmobs.user.build.dragon - Access to build Ender Dragons
blockmobs.admin.reload - Access to /blockmobs reload
blockmobs.command - Access to the /blockmobs command









file_1583207181000.jpg (176.97 KB, 下载次数: 1)
